title: Creating team for 2nd OOL split. Gold +
body: As the title suggests I am looking to create a team for the OOL. I am a support main so all other roles are open, I would to play as a team at least once a week until the event starts, last year the second split started on the 6th of June I believe (I know its a while away but more practise is good right??). So if you're a non-flaming, Gold + player looking to play competitive LOL then add me. IGN: Brewski63

replies.body:
Plat 5 - Support and ADC main, very comfortable on play making supports, comfortable on any ADC and can play at any time

IGN: canofkungfu

Platinum 1, Mid and Jg interested,
